# Get source:
wget ftp://ftp.alsa-project.org/pub/lib/alsa-lib-1.1.4.tar.bz2
tar xvf alsa-lib-1.1.4.tar.bz2
rm alsa-lib-1.1.4.tar.bz2

# Compile:
cd alsa-lib-1.1.4
./configure --prefix=$(pwd)/build --enable-shared=no --enable-static=yes
make -j6
make install
cd build/lib
ar x libasound.a

# NOW WE HAVE ALL .o in:
./build/lib/*.o

./src/pcm/.libs/libpcm.a
./src/control/.libs/libcontrol.a
./src/seq/.libs/libseq.a
./src/hwdep/.libs/libhwdep.a
./src/ucm/.libs/libucm.a
./src/timer/.libs/libtimer.a
./src/rawmidi/.libs/librawmidi.a
./src/mixer/.libs/libmixer.a
./src/topology/.libs/libtopology.a
./src/alisp/.libs/libalisp.a
